mapper.select: select s.*, r.rvTitle,r.rvlat,r.rvlng from stamp s Join review r On s.rvNo=r.rvNo
mapper.insert: insert into stampcheck(nickname,rvno,distance) SELECT * from (select #{nickName},rvno, CALC_DISTANCE(#{lat},#{lng}, rvlat, rvlng) DISTANCE from review r join profile p on r.nickname=p.nickname) where DISTANCE < 1
insert into memberStamp select distinct nickName, rvno from stampcheck where nickName = #{nickName}
mapper.select: select count(*) From memberstamp m Join stampCheck s ON m.rvNO=s.rvNO where m.nickname = #{nickName} and m.rvno =(select distinct rvno from stampcheck where nickName = #{nickName})
select * from stamp order by stNo desc
